item.title: Product marketing blogs
item.description: Context Providing Redocly customers with a monthly update on new features been rolled out across its products. Problem When I started at Redocly, a lot of customers were sometimes unaware of various features been rolled out across our products. The only way they could find this out was by contacting technical support. It was essential to let customers know frequently what we were working on and how it would enhance their developer experience.
